long_description:
The Stanford Court Hotel is the perfect San Francisco hotel for groups. You are probably asking yourself, “why? What makes Stanford Court Hotel so great?”. So here are the top reasons why, whether you are traveling for business or pleasure, you and your group will want to stay at our Nob Hill hotel.

 

 

Location. Stanford Court Hotel is located in the historic Nob Hill neighborhood, offering lots of San Francisco history to discover.

 

 

Technology. We have everything you will need to get your work done. We have computers and printers in our lobby, as well as iPads you can check out or power up with Powermat’s wireless charging stations throughout the lobby area for free.

 

 

FAST wi-fi. Our wi-fi is fast, like ridiculously fast. No more waiting for files uploads to take forever. This is great when traveling for work and you need to get that final presentation over to your clients. It is also great when you want to stream some movies or music in your room. Save your data for when you are exploring the city.

 

 

Coffee in lobby. Wake up with a cup of joe in our lobby. We serve only the best Equator Coffee in our lobby and it takes all of the hassle in waiting in line at a coffee shop. You can grab it and go or stay in the lobby and work in the alcove.

 

 

Fitness center. Maintain your fitness routine while traveling with complimentary access to our Fitness Center. Located on the second floor of the hotel, we have weight and cardio machines for your use if the San Francisco hills don’t tire you out.

 

 

Easily accessible. Situated on the corner of California and Powell, our hotel is minutes away from major San Francisco attractions, such as the Financial District, Union Square and Moscone Convention Center.

 

 

Cable car fun awaits you. You can hear the trolley ding from our lobby and your group does not want to miss the adventure of riding a cable car that you can only experience in San Francisco! Step outside of our lobby and hop on a cable car to begin the adventure.

 

 

Value. With dedicated and professional staff on hand to help you plan and execute your group’s visit you can’t go wrong with Stanford Court’s team on your side. We also offer discounted group deals too? #OMG Group Deals to be exact! Add value by checking out our current group offers or email Sales@stanfordcourt.com
